document_data.name: Aelis
document_data.mainbody: '''Aelis''' was a solider who fought for the [[Flaming Fist]] and the virtues it upheld during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Aelis had fair skin and red hair she wore up in a braid. She wore a suit of [[scale mail]] armor with a tabard that boasted emblazoned the crest of the Flaming Fist.
document_data.History: Aelis was among the Fist soldiers present at the [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn when it was raided, and set ablaze, [[goblin]] and [[drow]] [[Cult of the Absolute|cultists]] loyal to the [[the Absolute]]. She joined fellow soldiers [[Ito]], [[Pavel (Flaming Fist)|Pavel]], and Gauntlet [[Yeva]] as they tried to break through the front doors of the inn, in order to rescue Grand Duke [[Ulder Ravengard]].
